Class LowStockLookup

java.lang.Object
  LowStockLookup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Lookup
public class LowStockLookup
extends java.lang.Object
implements Lookup, java.io.Serializable

This class is a lookup that matches stock at or under a specific amount. The amount should be passed into the constructor when creating the instance of the lookup.

Version:
Summer 2013
Author:
Franklin University
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
LowStockLookup(int newAmount)
          Constructor for objects of class LowStockLookup.
 
Method Summary
 boolean matches(Product product)
          Return true if the given product's quantity on hand is less than or equal to the amount passed into our constructor, false otherwise.
